title: Carrots in Cream
introduction: Carrots are often enjoyed raw, but they are equally delicious when cooked. In this recipe, the natural sweetness of carrots is harmoniously enhanced by the richness of heavy cream, creating a comforting and elegant side dish.
instructions: 1. Peel the carrots. Cut them into 1/4-inch thick slices.
2. In a medium saucepan over medium heat, melt the butter. Add the carrots and salt to taste. Cover and cook, stirring occasionally, until the carrots are softened, about 5 minutes.
3. Stir in the cream and nutmeg. Cook until the cream is thickened and the carrots are tender, 4 to 5 minutes more. Serve immediately.
